title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7015.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7015.1 - Policy

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of this Part, each local
correctional facility shall establish and implement policies and procedures
designed to ensure that such facility is maintained in a sanitary
condition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7015.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
